data.title: Science Saru Anime List: What Other Shows Has the Scott Pilgrim Studio Made?
data.meta_description: What are the anime produced by Science Saru? Following the announcement of the Scott Pilgrim anime, fans might be wondering about what the animation studio behind it is like. Here is a guide on the Science Saru anime list and some shows it has done. List of anime made by Science Saru Popular series from […] The post Science Saru Anime List: What Other Shows Has the Scott Pilgrim Studio Made? appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
data.text:
What are the anime produced by Science Saru? Following the announcement of the Scott Pilgrim anime, fans might be wondering about what the animation studio behind it is like. Here is a guide on the Science Saru anime list and some shows it has done.

List of anime made by Science Saru

Popular series from Science Saru have distinct art styles that don’t fall under the usual style we see in anime. It’s a fun watch for those who want to see different visual aesthetics.

Devilman Crybaby

Devilman Crybaby is an anime series based on Go Nagai’s manga series titled Devilman. The story revolves around Akira Fudo, a high school student, and Ryo Asuka, his childhood friend. The two get involved in the world of demons, and Akira ends up winning over a powerful demon’s attempt at possessing him. As a result, Akira gets the powers of a demon, but his soul remains human.

Devilman Crybaby is available to stream on Netflix.

Keep Your Hands Off Eizouken!

Keep Your Hands Off Eizouken is a manga series created by Sumito Owara. The comedy and slice of life series began serialization in Shogakukan’s seinen magazine, Monthly Big Comic Spirits. The anime premiered in January 2020. The synopsis from Crunchyroll reads:

“First year high schooler Midori Asakusa loves anime so much, she insists that “concept is everything” in animation. Though she draws a variety of ideas in her sketchbook, she hasn’t taken the first step to creating anime, insisting that she can’t do it alone. The producer-type Sayaka Kanamori is the first to notice Asakusa’s genius. Then, when it becomes clear that their classmate, charismatic fashion model Tsubame Mizusaki, really wants to be an animator, they create an animation club to realize the “ultimate world” that exists in their minds.”

Keep Your Hands Off Eizouken is available to stream on Crunchyroll.

Yurei Deco

Yurei Deco is an anime original series that premiered in July 2022. Following the anime’s release, a webtoon adaptation by Digital Shokunin Studio began serialization in Line Manga the same month. The synopsis reads:

“The data-managed city of Tom Sawyer Island.

The citizens who live there use the sensory immersion technology called Deco in order to interact with the virtual spaces known as the Hyperverse as part of their daily lives.

Not only that but Tom Sawyer has a social credit system which is applied to everything that helps ensure a balanced set of values and a peaceful society.

…

One day, a girl named Berry meets Hack, a self-proclaimed “gh0st,” and then finds herself caught up in the Zero Phenomenon.

In order to solve the mystery of Phantom Zero and the Zero Phenomenon, Berry will join the the Yurei Detective Club formed by Hack’s friends.

And as the club solves the cases brought to them, Berry will discover the truth about Tom Sawyer Island.”

Yurei Deco is available to stream on Crunchyroll.

For more anime content, here’s the Best Anime on Netflix With English Voices Dubbed Audio. Also, here are the Best Anime Websites for Watching & Streaming Online.
